name: School Nightmare alpha
description: Welcome to the school. Here you will learn all sorts of Sciences and prepare for exams that will be useful for you to enter the University. The main character of the game - Andrew, who was in the center of the events that occurred before the end of the school year. At first everything was as usual, but soon something happened that everyone was afraid of... There was a monster in the school that wanted to kill everyone. Whether you can learn the secrets of this school and get out of there alive - time will tell...
